page.title: 13Gracemount High School.
page.content:
This is a six year comprehensive build in 1959,and extended at a later date.It can accommodate 1200 pupils,but the roll is now declining fairly rapidly.An education report gives the following statistics:-
YEAR PUPILS YEAR PUPILS
1979 967 1987 560* 1983 839 1990 430* 1984 760 1992 430* *estimate. The possibility of amalgamating G.H.S. with Liberton High School has been considered, but the question has been dropped meantime. The prospect of a "splt-site" school does not find favour with parents or staff. Pupils belong to Pentland,Moorfoot or Lammermuir House.The school has the only swimmng pool in this block.
